additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 2 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 2 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 2 attack damage.
name: Circlet
description: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
